review: We are trying to get rid of our Direct TV. This works great but we will not be getting rid of Direct just yet. I like to watch our local news and you cannot get local news from this. I'm thinking about getting a tv antenna for the roof of our house and keeping this also. There are a lot of episodes that need to be paid for- which I refuse to pay $2-5 for an episode of SpongeBob or any other show.
